description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"call to submissions: poetry (LGBTQ+)","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"we are putting together our first poetry collection, which aims to platform LGBTQ+ poets.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"there are no rules regarding genre, style or subject matter.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you become a part of this anthology we would like your section be several pages long, be that one long poem or a selection of smaller ones.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
